descriptionHTML:
THE BEST ONLINE CRIME SYNDICATE GAME!
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Play with MILLIONS of players NOW in the LARGEST, most INTENSE, SOCIAL CRIME MMORPG!
Lead your EMPIRE to DOMINATION!

Choose your allegiances to different criminal empires: the diabolical CARTEL, sinister SYNDICATE, ruthless MAFIA, or battle-tested STREET GANGS!

ANNIHILATE and EXECUTE other LIVE players!
GROW your CHARACTER and EMPIRE!
AND LEAD SOLDIERS, GANGSTERS, MOB BOSSES to become a GODFATHER!

BUILD YOUR ARSENAL
▶ Over 1000 Common, Uncommon, Rare, Epic, and Legendary items
▶ Tons of melee weapons, guns, rifles, cars and assault vehicles to take your enemies down
▶ Boost stats and customize your attacks with powerful weapons
▶ Arm Lieutenants with the best gear and weapons and lead your Empire to victory
▶ Complete ""jobs"": rob casinos, break friends out of jail and take over territories

GUNS FOR HIRE
▶ Select top lieutenants to lead your Empire
▶ Customize your empire with over 50 unique Lieutenants with unique abilities
▶ Take down the competition with unique Lieutenant powers
▶ Level up and fuse your Lieutenants to make them more effective

DEFEAT POWERFUL BOSSES
▶ Team up with up to 200 other players to take down powerful bosses
▶ Show off your skills and scale the real time boss battle leaderboard
▶ Earn epic loot and bragging rights by beating the toughest bosses

ALL OUT UNDERWORLD WAR
▶ Join or create your own Empire with up to 80 players
▶ Battle to become the toughest Empire in 80 vs. 80 Empire Wars
▶ Every player has a strategic role. Play as an Enforcer, Heavy Weapons, Sniper or Assassin
▶ Earn the most experience and upgrade hundreds of skill by participating in PvP battles

HD DISPLAY GRAPHICS!
▶ 1080p ready for a hi-def gaming experience

OPTIMIZED FOR ANDROID
▶ Supported on tablets of all makes and sizes


*********************************
By downloading this game, you agree to the Terms of Service, Privacy Policy and the License Agreement.

https://www.kabam.com/corporate/terms-of-service
https://www.kabam.com/corporate/privacy-policy
https://www.kabam.com/corporate/eula
*********************************

topReviews.reviewText: If u loved Mafia Wars from back in the day like 7 yrs ago then this is your game. No complaints. Just great fun!!!
Aside from some connection issues, the game works well and looks good. Good time waster.
I like mafia wars. Heck, I played it like crazy before. This game, idk, something's bothering me.
I stayed playing late in 2014. I've met a great group of players that are like family. We call ourselves boom nation.

The game play is fine. The WWD is a bit laggy. The real improvement would be to be able to adjust 100sp points every 48hrs. As players we soon learn that we have put our sp points in wrong places. It would be nice to be able to readjust these points.
This game is fun but you need to gave more gold plss
This game is fun and addictive in its own way. It's like an upgrade to the old mafia wars.
Love ya UE......
topReviews.reviewTitle: Next event can we get boss fights.... all br 16 and up look same..... bosses drop junk half time

topReviews.reviewText: The PTW currency is Favor Points. The devs have made it so there is no confirmation screen when purchasing FP items. Have a finger twitch or tap the wrong spot and your points are gone for good. They refuse to do anything about it. Until this is fixed I will not support this game with purchases, nor will my rating change. This is a cheap shot to make people buy more points.
topReviews.reviewTitle: Good, but devs are very sneaky

topReviews.reviewText: It very annoying. I cant join empire war since world war even it not live. Worthless world war. It very bug. Just delete it and thinking new event. Dont give event bug. Your game just will be bug forever if you keep this world war

I haven't been able to play this game for the last 6 months.   Everytime I install the update or download a new, the game just crashes.   Sent multiple reports to Kabam  and PA to get it fixed.   Still nothing.   Will not be spending a dime on this.
Addictive game
Good game
Fyck you. 0/100
Addicting game like this
topReviews.reviewTitle: Best game I have ever played

topReviews.reviewText: Good game if you have the money to build up.
I love how you set it up
I just wish everything I'd done on my iPhone transfered over
Five stars if we can get gold free for how many min playing game one hour one gold please
topReviews.reviewTitle: Good but we need more gold

topReviews.reviewText: Adjusting to a few things but still have to get my bearings
Its a little bit lagy
Great app very fun n a lot of features unlike other games, get it!
Has a lot is guns, stick house and mansions.
topReviews.reviewTitle: This game is out there already

topReviews.reviewText: A should download app
Getting the hang of it
Me and my dad love this game. My dad is so obsessed with this game that he spent over $200 dollars on this game. Love and highly recommend it
Love it!! So addicted....
All Day
Plus its a good game...when my Android is not crashing.
topReviews.reviewTitle: Hottest chicks in a game ever

topReviews.reviewText: Fun.well thought out.awesome graphics.great for passing the time.lol.
Dope
I have noting to say
It's a great app love it
Good game
Really love... remind me of the old days when playing Mafia Wars
Amazing
Best game ever
Fun games
nice
It is a good game to kill time

whatsNewHTML:
What's New

Frequently Requested Features:
▶ Now you can call backup from FPS-enabled bosses!
▶ Fight all 4 empire battles in a day by default
Get Ready for WORLD WAR
▶ Fight against 5 enemy empires and battle over 300 enemy players at the same time!
▶ Explore the new Arena map
▶ Conquer and Defend as much territory as you can in the evolution of Empire vs. Empire combat!
New Features
▶ Battle the Mafia and earn parts for the AH-77 War Machine!
▶ Look out for new "Outlaw" Lieutenants!
